title: Warrior 12 Ronin
features: Warrior 12 Premium Patriotic Apparel - Ronin - Samurai Shirt
description: Our Ronin shirt pays tribute to the lord-less samurai. It features Japanese lettering for "Ronin" on the front and "Samurai" on the left sleeve. In feudal Japan, the Samurai were supposed to commit ritual suicide after the loss of their lord. Those who did not kill themselves wandered as outcasts, often becoming soldiers for hire. Dedicated to the warriors with no masters. Shirt is light grey in color. 5XL is a heather gray.
